title: FS 100+ N172 Old Judges - SGC Graded - ALL SOLD
author: Baseball Rarities

posts.post_title: FS 100+ N172 Old Judges - SGC Graded - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
The following Old Judge cards are available for sale. I will do my best to remove the cards from the list as they are sold. Priority given to emails. The numbers are taken from the Miller/Gonsowski/Masson book.

Images of all of the cards can be viewed here:

[url]http://photobucket.com/oldjudges[/url]

Please call or email me with any questions. If needed, I have many references.

Checks are preferred. Please add $5 per order to help with postage and insurance.

Thanks, Kevin

I just purchased three Old Judges from Kevin and wanted to let the Board know that it was a super experience.  Kevin was responsive, sent the cards FedEx at my request and shipped them very quickly. Thanks, Kevin -- hope to do business with you again.

Kevin,
 Thanks for the Old Judge Rowe. Fast delivery no problems.

Joe
List has been updated - a few cards that were put on hold, but not paid for, have been added back in.
A freindly bump for Kevin. Made me a great deal and was a quality guy to deal with (I asked ALOT of questions and he answered them all). Take a look, he's got some great cards!
